text: Eric Bogosian (born April 24, 1953) is an American actor, playwright, monologist, and novelist. ==Personal life== Bogosian met Jo Bonney in 1980. Six weeks later he married her. He has two children with her. ==References== == Other websites == *Bogosian's home website Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American playwrights Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Massachusetts
title: Eric Bogosian
